decks.notes: This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on bringing out creatures quickly and using damage spells to control the board and push for lethal damage. With Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with early aggression and burn spells like Fatal Push and Monstrous Rage. Monastery Swiftspear and Heartfire Hero are key creatures in this aggressive strategy, while Slickshot Show-Off and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide additional damage and removal options. The deck seeks to close out games quickly before opponents can stabilize.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through removal spells and disruption while utilizing powerful creatures to dominate the board. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion allows for additional value from flicker effects and provides a consistent way to generate advantage. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's three-color requirements, allowing for flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to outlast opponents through attrition and overwhelm them with its resilient threats.
